text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! avashy hee bahut-se dharmagyaata aur sansaar-tyaagee sant aise hai jo logo ko maal naahaq khaate hai aur allaah ke maarg se rokate hai, aur jo log sona aur chaandee ekatr karake rakhate hai aur unhen allaah ke maarg mein kharch nahin karate, unhen dukhad yaatana kee shubh-soochana de do
